storyInfo:
After the tension eases, the ensuing conversation allows the Doctor learn more about the operators, as well as about Patriot's squad.
As for Patriot, Guard begins to move, but his way is blocked.

attributes.content: The ritual has no affect on these Sarkaz... But our Sarkaz operators aren't immune? Why?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But they didn't look like they were with the guerrilla team. Strange...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I'm going on patrol.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't thank me. Like Amiya always says, you don't thank people for doing their jobs.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The effects of the Oripathy inhibitor will take a while to show. But for now, you should be feeling a lot less pain.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Take the medicine back to the others. There isn't much, probably only enough for one dose, but it will help with acute symptoms.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did you really come to help us?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but we can't help you much more than this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have to defeat the leader of Reunion before we can do anything else.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also... if Reunion breaks into a full-scale riot again, I think we won't be able to handle them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All those things I said to you... I... I wasn't like this before.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: I used to hate you people. But now, I'm like you. Everyone hates me too.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: I very nearly killed him. But without his help... we might already be dead.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: But every time he let us go find supplies, someone died. I thought for sure that was proof he was working with Reunion, to toy with us.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Even though we're already Infected? Does Reunion... really hate the Ursus so much?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: People don't need much to indulge in the ugliest side of their nature. Just giving them free rein can contaminate every part of a city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit... you scared me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, you shouldn't be letting these games get the better of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just once or twice is enough...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll spoil our plans if you waste so much time talking.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So... Dr. Kal'tsit, if she lied, were you really going to kill me?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I... I didn't lie though!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Just hypothetically. Not every Infected is so honest after they've been hurt. I've acted on impulse before myself.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Um... *sigh*...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're a Rhodes Island operator. I trust you over all others.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's call it a form of psychological treatment for her. Naturally, the way you and she responded to it proved your innocence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That look on your face was so dark and terrifying. I really thought you were going to do it... your act was way too convincing.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Sounds fine to me. I wouldn't do it, but I'd like to make people think that I would.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, you really pushed it... no more terrorizing Guard.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't worry, Guard. If she did go too far, I would've stepped in to stop her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Did all that spike your emotional state? Should I help you recuperate?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, no need. I'd be awful weak if I needed the Amiya treatment after just that.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: After all... The one I really worry about is the little one standing by the door.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But even that's looking better. She and I sorted things out, and I think I get it... but I still can't let go of the time she split a person clean in half with the sweep of a claymore.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That's gonna be with me my whole life.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Oh... I know the incident you're talking about.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Guard... did you know she saved four civilian lives during that operation? That the military was testing weapons on them?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She killed an abandoned weapons-grade experimental caster they'd bought from a Sargon slaver. The entire batch of casters had their pituitary glands surgically removed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The glands were replaced with an Originium device that kept them moving without input from their own nervous systems. They were already dead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Only Rosmontis, with her unique fighting style, could destroy the experimental infected organs. She did nothing wrong.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...So that's what happened?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Guard, I think you misjudged Rosmontis the same way that young lady misjudged you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What you look like, and any rumors going around about you, are anyone's first window into your personality. No matter what you did, they'd be looking at you as Reunion first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But if we never got past the surface... we'd never know anything, let alone learn to trust.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If no one tries to find the truth, then no matter how hard we work to sow its seeds, they won't germinate.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And anyway, Rosmontis is right in front of you. Why don't you just... ask her?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A-Ask her?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: What do you want to ask?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: (Um, not like that... she won't know what to say...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Rosmontis, what are you here for?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: My mission.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...And, like I said, getting revenge. For my family.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'm done asking.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But... I don't even know what I asked.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I was angry at Azazel before, and now I was rude to Rosmontis. Hah, what a mess I am.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But you trust Patriot. Tell us about Patriot and his guerrillas, and about Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure Dr. Kal'tsit and Dr. {@nickname} here can make sense of it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The only reason there's anyone still left alive, why so many Ursus were able to make it through Chernobog...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Is because Patriot and his guerrillas. And the people who respect them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: When the guerrilla fighters were around, there was peace. Nobody dared to raise a hand against anybody else.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Not only did they hand out supplies and resources, but they even worked to make the locals' lives a little better.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...Patriot was going to let me leave the city. But I decided to stay... to see how things turned out.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I overheard him talking to the leader of Azazel. I think even if it's all an act, he's at least working hard to keep up the act.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Also... Mr. Scout died there to protect me. Patriot respected Mr. Scout. I...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.options: Scout... was an operator who sacrificed himself in Chernobog.

attributes.content: Scout!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What happened to Scout?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I... why can't I remember? He died? He...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This emptiness... is that him? Scout... I forgot again?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I just... the terminal... how could I forget again?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: January 3rd
An old man with white hair brought a charred, blackened object. Mechanist couldn't stand after seeing it.
The old man nodded and left. Dr. Kal'tsit didn't say anything, only patted my head.
It was Scout's.
Scout.
Scout is gone too.
Scout was the one who didn't even have a shadow, wasn't he? Wouldn't he be the one who came back even when everyone else died? Wasn't he the one with a never-ending story?
Scout......
I searched the logs. Scout made me a bow. But that's a toy for little girls. I don't play with toys anymore.
Why did Scout die?
Why? Why? Why?
Why?
*sobs*...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Give me your hand. Close your eyes, Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Turns out elite operators... aren't that different... from my teammates.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I've got something to say.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: On your rescue operation, Scout led the recon team. He never knew you like you are now... But he said he knew you before, like Ace.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He held back the Sarkaz mercenaries to save my life.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Knowing Scout, he could've easily gotten out if he wanted to.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He told me to tell you something... Right, I remember it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He said he would never forget fighting by your side.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He also wanted you to stop being a commander. But things being what they are, I think you probably can't just sit by and watch.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Boss sacrificed himself to save me too. That means I've got two elite operators' lives on my shoulders.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But Mr. Scout said they didn't die for any one person. They died for an idea.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: His team did, and so did mine.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: So I decided to look into Reunion. I had to see where things were going, and how I could help Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: —I saw the guerrillas had their own idea. A firm, pure conviction that they were fighting for.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: They were a little more savage, of course, but they never found joy in violence. That's what I saw in them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If Reunion was supposed to be about liberating the Infected, then the guerrillas... they were there to exterminate their oppressors.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: They'd exterminate those who enslave the Infected, and those who threaten the common folk. All of them. To a man.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That's because of Patriot. Patriot taught them, led them, and protected them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Before Patriot set out from Chernobog on a mission, I had a... talk with him.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Just how old is that warrior? But he still shared some of his booze with me. It was the first time... anybody treated me like that.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He may indeed be much older than you think.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Have you heard the legend? About him leaving Ursus?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I have. He led an entire elite division out of Ursus. The Great Rebellion proved to be fertile ground for all sorts of things that otherwise would've been absurd.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The truth is, there aren't many of those soldiers he led out of Ursus left.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Their clashes with the Ursus regulars must've cost them a lot of men.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Most of his guerrillas are fresh recruits, people who volunteered to join when they fought in the northwest tundra.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Their battles, their prestige, and their ideals all won them recruits.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: They used to work well with the leader of Reunion. But for some reason, maybe related to the burning hate the Infected have for the people of Ursus... things turned out like this.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: It is what it is. Everyone alive today suffers Catastrophes, madness, and death. All kinds of suffering that this world heaps upon them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Tatiana... I remember your name is Tatiana.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...That's right.
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: Does your knee hurt?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: Three days ago, you tripped trying to run away.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: It got better a while ago...! I'm Ursus! I'm not like... whatever your race is. Us Ursus are much sturdier.
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: I'm glad... it looked pretty nasty.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Hah, here I am, doing a medic operator's job without any training.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I've got a lot on my plate, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Medic didn't come with you?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Why bring her up?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I can tell by the look on Rosmontis's face what happened. We've lost a lot of people, but Rhodes Island fights on.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I'm getting the impression that you don't know the core city is on a collision course with Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Oh, are you talking about helping the Reunion forces at the battle of Lungmen? Moving the core city is Reunion's only play. I heard about that.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The core city is broadcasting an Ursus identification code.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...What?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Hold up!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...No way... That doesn't make any sense!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Now you know why we're here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What's the problem?
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: (Makes the Rhodes Island hand gesture for 'quiet.')
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nothing...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...You've been talking so long. If Patriot and his men are as good as you say, why is Reunion still running amok here in Ursus?
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: Because Reunion 'shouldn't' be doing this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: Guard...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think you would be a great help to our operation, since you're familiar with both the local Infected and Reunion. Would you be willing to rejoin our team?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, but you can't leave yet, can you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Right. I'm sure you can tell just by looking at me. Right, Amiya?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Sorry, I know I'm about a decade older than you, but sometimes you make me feel like a kid.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: No need to blame yourself. I could even say Rhodes Island will honor your work.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...But you're in a very dangerous position.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Guard, if Reunion falls here, your work to save the Infected and maintain their basic living conditions will become much more difficult.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you at all worried that could come to pass?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Because Reunion has Patriot.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: As long as he's here, Reunion won't fall.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: A lot of guerrilla fighters left camp and gathered up. I'm thinking that's because he may be back already.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And if he's here, I believe Reunion can still change.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But Reunion lacks the impetus to change. Looking at the evidence, Talulah has certainly not devoted herself to the cause.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Chernobog's core city, the ruins of Chernobog back there, and the Ursus Infected...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can't forget that the Ursus Third Army is still out there waiting to act. That will make everything drastically worse.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I know Reunion is relatively strong.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And there are a few things... Rhodes Island can't handle. This is one of those things!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is a corporation. Dr. Kal'tsit has been very clear about that, time and again.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I believe in Boss, and Mr. Scout...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And I believe in Patriot.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Aren't you mad, Amiya?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Why should I be mad at you... over things we can't do, and things we haven't done?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So much happened these past two weeks. We've all changed a lot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we're not about to turn on each other because of the Infected. I think all that happened in Chernobog, and what Guard and I saw, were the same.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Correct. I still can't stand hurting people like that. No matter who's doing it to who, I won't stand for it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If Patriot wants to clean house in Reunion, I have to stand with him, with his men, and with all the Reunion members who believe in Patriot.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: We do not consider your new way of thinking to be a threat to our interests.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In fact, we encourage all our operators to learn more about the outside world, seek out their own goals, and build their self-confidence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our ideas are constantly changing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Thank you, Dr. Kal'tsit, Amiya.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Oh, yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can also contact the Doctor later.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As for my responsibilities at Rhodes Island... Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit... Will they be more important?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...I wouldn't put it that way, Guard. It's more important to decide for yourself what you want to do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And, personally, I think that any of us would have done the same in your position.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Different people make different choices. If something's important to you, it's important.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope you find a place for yourself among these Ursus, like you wanted. I hope you can protect those deserving of protection.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...W-why are you looking at me...?
attributes.name: Tatiana

attributes.content: ...I'm not. No reason. Just thinking.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Oh yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Regarding your pay, I'm afraid your work here doesn't support a salary. Sorry.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Also, Guard, please do tell me—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If Patriot betrays Talulah, what happens then?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...That won't happen. Patriot trusts Talulah deeply.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Now what about the other way around?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Dr. Kal'tsit?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: What if Talulah betrays Patriot?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or, what if I told you we encountered the Reunion commander, FrostNova, and by any objective measure, are responsible for her death?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit?! What are you saying?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That... th-that's Patriot's daughter...!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If we fight Patriot...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That would be the worst case scenario. And it's what the puppetmasters would want.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If Talulah really is turning a blind eye to, or even allowing the Infected to harm innocent civilians in spite of Patriot's stance... I believe that's no longer just turning a blind eye.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A lot of Infected will make Patriot into a target. Those who don't know the truth, and those who let their hatred get the better of them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And those who want to.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... I have to go.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I have to tell Patriot!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But... Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Will he be... your enemy?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.options: I didn't think things would turn out like this.

attributes.content: It's not the obvious step for Reunion to take.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether Misha or FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Us, Reunion, and Lungmen too... We can't let anyone else slip through the cracks.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, we still have a lot to do... just thinking of what comes next is making me tired.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But before that... we have to find Madame Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And, most importantly...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The leader of Reunion. She's the cause of all of this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right. Team Mantra-2, come in.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The captain has determined Reunion's communication method. It's primitive, even artificial-looking. As for personnel, she's just about done clearing the area.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Not the guerrillas though. They're tough.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Should we eliminate them?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No need for that. We're not here to eliminate them, or have them butcher each other.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We're not here to stir up internal conflict. They should oppose those who misled them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's her question. I'm good.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Naturally... not now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Their spirit is rotten, but their fabrication of a backbone still remains.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take it away or break it, and watch them crumble. That's what we might have done at first.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Talulah was a step ahead of us. She stirred the conflict and fanned its flames.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I originally thought that she had gone mad. But this is poison, not madness.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Infected and the people of the city will surely rise up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Talulah gave them the chance to intermingle and build bridges.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She must still have a queen on the board, or she wouldn't be so bold.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I firmly believe that she wants to destroy Reunion, in the most dishonorable possible way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...And this is a poison that we must neutrallize.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But all this hinges on what Buldrokkas'tee decides to do...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It looks like we've successfully infiltrated the core city.

attributes.content: Because what we do next can hardly be called an infiltration, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As I said when we started, infiltration is only about twenty percent of our plan here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To get to the core command tower and the generator area to halt Chernobog's movement, we will have to go through the central district.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now, the enemies in our path are not your run-of-the-mill Reunion, nor are they brutish Sarkaz sellswords.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's put W aside for now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As a tactician, you should be more concerned about this than about Talulah, Reunion's tyrant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Infected Guerrillas of the Northern Plains, a thorn in the hinterland of Ursus's Fourth Army to the northwest... Since its formation, it has only ever had one leader.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ordinary resistance fighters get slaughtered, but these guerrillas were able to turn the tables on the butchers.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Local stakeholders could request the mobilization of a division or two to knock them out, but it would be taken as an admission of incompetence to the generals and the State Council.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The war raged for so long that the Infected hiding out in the snow came to call the guerrillas their 'Aegis.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Aegis of the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Yeti Squad was one of its subsets, and its members did not solely consist of Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The exiles, the fanatics, the maimed, Elves, Durin, and Sarkaz. The guerrillas did not fight for the Infected alone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It's exactly what you're thinking.;......;I just said whatever came to mind.

attributes.content: Just like Rhodes Island, yes?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just as before, Rhodes Island will benefit from your intuition, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: You're not mad?;......;I thought you wouldn't appreciate that.

attributes.content: Why do you look into my eyes when you say that?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's nothing to see in these eyes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's no point in staying silent at a time like this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's your choice whether or not you hold an opinion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Would you rather I didn't?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You want me to reprimand you, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not now. I don't think you do, and I don't think there's anything wrong with what you said.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In an unexpectedly apt analogy, the guerrilla fighters also trust only one commander, and embrace only that one commander.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes, Doctor, this guerrilla force is another sort of 'Rhodes Island.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But their leader? No.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, prepare yourself well. Or you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even though one of our objectives is to clear a path through the central district to the bridge and the generator area...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For your own safety, I still hope you and Amiya will not face him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if this is all inevitable, then I can only repeat what I just said.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Prepare yourself well, Dr. {@nickname}. And before you face him, you must prepare to face his guerrillas.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I rarely offer my advice to others, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But that is 'Patriot,' Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Still... another... block?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: No... No! I have to... I have to tell Patriot...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If Talulah... if Talulah lets these people... strike at the guerrillas...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Then... then... the guerrillas will... they will...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Be killed by their own...!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Patriot... Patriot is the only level-headed one left in Reunion...!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Where do you think you're going?
You...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: What brigade are you with? And what business do you have in the central district?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Explain it to me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Oh, or maybe you're with the old Wendigo.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The prey ran right up to me on his own.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What did you learn, weak little Infected outlander?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary
